message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value that represents the increase in tax accrued but not yet paid from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see there's a line item labeled "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 169880.98. This is exactly what I'm looking for, as Tax Payable represents taxes that have been accrued but not yet paid.

The positive value of 169880.98 indicates an increase in the amount of tax accrued but not yet paid during the period ending 2024-02-05.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '169880.98'}}
```
